**FAQ**

**How long does it take to deliver the VPS?**

All our VPS are delivered within 24 hours, as they are manually delivered, all of them go through a review
to avoid fraud spam requests. However we can delay up 72 hours if it exists some additional issue.

**Can i reinstall my vps?**

Yes, you can do it, you have absolute control from your VPS

**Do you offer refunds?**

Yes, We offer refunds until the third day of delivered your VPS, if you are not happy with the service
open a ticket support.
